content: Singaporean politician **Foo Cexiang**[a] (born 11 July 1985) is a Singaporean politician who was elected to the [Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore) in the [2025 general election](/wiki/2025_Singaporean_general_election). He represents the [Tanjong Pagar Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_Group_Representation_Constituency) as a member of the [People's Action Party](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party). ## Career Foo is currently the Vice President (Port Ecosystem Development) at [PSA](/wiki/PSA_International), driving the development of PSA's Supply Chain Hub, as well as PSA's strategies for the Johor-Singapore Special Economic Zone (SEZ) and inter-modal supply chain solutions. ### Civil career Foo started his career in the [Singapore Civil Service](/wiki/Singapore_Civil_Service), serving over a decade in various ministries and government agencies including [JTC Corporation](/wiki/JTC_Corporation), the [Ministry of Trade and Industry](/wiki/Ministry_of_Trade_and_Industry_(Singapore)), the [Ministry of Home Affairs](/wiki/Ministry_of_Home_Affairs_(Singapore)) (MHA) and the [Ministry of Education](/wiki/Ministry_of_Education_(Singapore)) (MOE). Foo was a director in the [Ministry of Transport](/wiki/Ministry_of_Transport_(Singapore)) (MOT) overseeing private and future mobility, including the transition to electric vehicles in Singapore. ### Political career At the 2025 general election, Foo was fielded in [Tanjong Pagar GRC](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_Group_Representation_Constituency) led by [Chan Chun Sing](/wiki/Chan_Chun_Sing). His team received 81.02% of the vote against a [People's Alliance for Reform](/wiki/People%27s_Alliance_for_Reform) (PAR) team led by [Han Hui Hui](/wiki/Han_Hui_Hui) that received 18.98%. ## Personal life Foo is married and is a father of three children. ## Notes [Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore)Preceded by[Chan Chun Sing](/wiki/Chan_Chun_Sing) [Joan Pereira](/wiki/Joan_Pereira) [Eric Chua](/wiki/Eric_Chua) [Indranee Rajah](/wiki/Indranee_Rajah) [Alvin Tan](/wiki/Alvin_Tan_(politician)) **[Member of Parliament](/wiki/Member_of_Parliament) for [Tanjong Pagar GRC](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_GRC)** 2025â€“present Served alongside: **(2025-present): [Chan Chun Sing](/wiki/Chan_Chun_Sing), [Joan Pereira](/wiki/Joan_Pereira), [Rachel Ong](/wiki/Rachel_Ong), [Alvin Tan](/wiki/Alvin_Tan_(politician))****Incumbent** This article about a politician from Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Foo Cexiang
